description: This table contains claim line information for claims associated with the hospital account/liability bucket. For uniform medical billing (UB) claims, this table contains pre-processing charge information, which is used in the creation of UB claim lines. Post-processing claim line data for UB claims is stored in the HSP_CLP_REV_CODE table. For CMS claims, this table contains the post-processing claim line data.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim record associated with a single hospital account or liability bucket.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: REIMB_AMT
columns.description: Stores the reimbursement amount for claim line.

columns.name: REIMB_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reimbursement method.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Charge Entry Line Calculation


Invoice Line Calculation


Invoice Bundle Calculation


APC

columns.name: FROM_SERV_DT
columns.description: Stores the from date for a claim line. For services that do not span multiple days, the service date will be held here.

columns.name: TO_SERV_DT
columns.description: Stores the through date for a claim line.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_PER_TX
columns.description: Stores the place of service type per transaction.

columns.name: TOS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of service for the claim line.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medical Care


Surgery


Consultation


Diagnostic Radiology


Diagnostic Laboratory


Therapeutic Radiology


Anesthesia


Assistant at Surgery


Other Medical Items or Services


Whole Blood


Used Durable Medical Equipment (DME)

Third Opinion on Elective Surgery (Obsolete)

Rental of DME

Diagnostic Lab (Professional) (Obsolete)


Diagnostic Medical (Professional) (Obsolete)

CRD Equipment (Obsolete)

High Risk Screening Mammography


Low Risk Screening Mammography


Ambulance


Enteral/Parenteral Nutrients/Supplies

Lump Sum Purchase of DME, Prostethics, Orthotics

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: Stores the internal procedure ID.

columns.name: PROC_DESC
columns.description: Stores the procedure description.

columns.name: HCPCS_CODES
columns.description: Stores the Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System code for the claim line.

columns.name: PROF_CLM_MODIFIERS
columns.description: Stores modifiers on the claim line.

columns.name: DX_MAP
columns.description: Comma-delimited list of diagnosis pointers for the claim line.

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.description: Stores the quantity associated with the claim line.

columns.name: OVRD_REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the override revenue code.

columns.name: OVRD_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: CHARGE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the charge amount for the claim line.

columns.name: INS_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the insurance amount due for the claim line.

columns.name: PAT_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the patient amount due for the claim line.

columns.name: NON_CVD_AMT
columns.description: Stores the non-covered amount for the claim line.

columns.name: PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the payment amount for the claim line.

columns.name: INSURANCE_PAID_AMT
columns.description: Stores the insurance amount paid for the claim line.

columns.name: PAT_PAID_AMT
columns.description: Stores the patient amount paid for the claim line.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the adjustment amount for the claim line.

columns.name: PRINT_DESCRIPTIO_YN
columns.description:
This controls procedure description printing for professional claims.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: REV_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: Revenue location for the line.

columns.name: DEPT_ID
columns.description: Department of service for the line.

columns.name: PX_START_DT
columns.description: Start date for timed procedures.

columns.name: PX_STOP_DT
columns.description: Stop date for timed procedures.

columns.name: PX_START_TM
columns.description: Start time for timed procedures.

columns.name: PX_STOP_TM
columns.description: Stop time for timed procedures.

columns.name: LINE_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment for the line.

columns.name: LINE_POS_ID
columns.description: Place of service ID.

columns.name: CMS_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the code type for the transaction level Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System code override. If a procedure has been assigned to the line without setting the override, this column will be left blank.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CPT(R)


HCPCS


ADA


ASA


SKS


THL


CBV


VT


ZA


CCSD

columns.name: CMS_REND_PROV_ID
columns.description: This item holds the line level rendering provider for American National Standards Institute claims. Professional claims will use this value to print the claim and line rendering provider loops.

columns.name: CMS_MOLDX_TEST_CODE
columns.description: Holds the auxiliary procedure code for a CMS line.

columns.name: CMS_AUXPX_CD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the type of auxiliary procedure code when one is applicable to a CMS line.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Laboratory Test Code


Molecular Diagnostic Test Code

columns.name: CMS_PRIOR_AUTH
columns.description: Stores the prior-authorization number for a service line.

columns.name: CMS_REF_NUM
columns.description: Stores the referral number for a service line.

columns.name: CMS_LINKED_AUTH_ID
columns.description: Stores the professional billing charge level linked authorization ID.

columns.name: CMS_MEDICARE_PAID_AMT
columns.description: For eMedNY 150003 claims, this is the amount that Medicare paid for this service line. This appears in field 24K (SVC_LN_INFO_2.LN_MCR_PAID_AMT). The EMEDNY_MEDICARE_PLANS profile variable can be used to control which coverages count as Medicare coverages.

columns.name: INVOICE_GRP_LN
columns.description: The group line number on the invoice record that corresponds to the data in INVOICE_CLM_LN.
